message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CYBER, cs.CE, cs.SI, cs.IR 

The paper focuses on the utilization and effectiveness of persuasive technology in reducing sedentary behavior at work, which involves human-computer interaction (HCI) and cyber systems. Therefore, cs.HC and cs.CYBER are the most likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper discusses the deployment of persuasive technology in intervention studies, which may fall under the sub-categories of cs.CE (computer engineering), cs.SI (social and information networks), and cs.IR (information retrieval).
